\newcommand{\lyxdot}{.}

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{flushleft}
\begin{sidewaysfigure}
\caption{MT indexes \label{fig:MT-indexes-all}(Reference: all regions)}


\begin{centering}
\includegraphics{H:/git/zeit-2/figs/mt\lyxdot nde}
\par\end{centering}

Note: Media Tenor indexes are represented with a solid line using
the left hand side scale. As a reference industrial production is
plotted, as well, represented by a dashed line using the right hand
side scale.

\centering{}
\end{sidewaysfigure}

\par\end{flushleft}
